ygData.subject: Re: Corpse retrieval
ygData.msgSnippet: Ahhh..............earlier version of this message said level 6 was the longer-corpse-retrieval-time cut off.  My mistake. And I ll be 30 in January. =) Sara,
ygData.messageBody:
Ahhh..............earlier version of this message said level 6 was the
longer-corpse-retrieval-time cut off. My mistake.
And I'll be 30 in January. =)

Sara, Povar

sgj wrote:

> From: sgj <sgj31@...>
>
> At 11:59 AM 6/18/99 -0700, you wrote:
> >From: Heather Hire <hrootbeer@...>
> >
> >Oh dear. At level 3 you only get 1/2 hour to get your corpse...after
> >level 6 that's when you get a week...what were you doing in High Pass?
> >Someone lead you astray.
>
> I wanted to go, and the group I was with did very well at keeping me
> safe...until I got separated. I wanted to go. It was my choice. It's boring
> staying in the same place all the time. I really didn't have anything that
> won't be easily replaced. It was nice seeing new surroundings. :)
>
> Tbaald
>
